USB debugging is intended for development purposes only. Use it to copy data between your computer and your device, install apps on your device without notification, and read log data.

Battery connection error. Please contact the customer support centre.
Power Saving Mode cannot be used during charging
Temperature too high; cannot charge the battery.
Temperature too low; cannot charge the battery.
The battery voltage is too high. Please replace the battery.
Black Screen Mode turns off your screen, but keeps running apps that are currently being used.

Black Screen Mode reduces your screen brightness to help you save battery power and restricts screen operations to prevent accidental touches. Apps you use in this mode will still run and consume data as normal.
Swipe up to exit Black Screen Mode
Disables the Bluetooth absolute volume feature in case of volume issues with remote devices such as unacceptably loud volume or lack of control.

These settings are intended for development use only. They can cause your device and the applications on it to break or misbehave.

"Note: After a reboot, this app can't start until you unlock your phone"
Always use GPU for screen compositing
Turn on \"Do Not Disturb\" status alerts
The phone will be silent with no vibration (except for Always Allowed items)

In \"Do Not Disturb\", your phone is muted and does not vibrate even when it receives calls, messages, or notifications (except for those you have permitted), and a moon symbol is shown in the status bar. Alarms and countdown timers will not be muted.
This device is managed by your organization

To connect your keyboard to the tablet, you need to have Bluetooth turned on.
Enable support for experimental freeform windows.

Enable terminal app that offers local shell access
Automatically jump to the red packet chat interface

"1. Red Packet Assistant currently supports red packet alerts for WeChat and will become available for more apps later. 2. WeChat notifications must be turned on so that Red Packet Assistant can function properly. Please turn them on in \"Settings - Notification & Status Bar - Manage Notifications - WeChat\". 3. If you open red packets too fast too many times, red packet platforms may ban you from using Red Packet Assistant."
SD card is corrupt. Unable to read
USB storage device is damaged. Try reformatting it.

"Your phone will automatically try to cool itself down. You can still use your phone, but its speed may slow down further.
When the phone has cooled down, its speed will return to normal."
Some functions will be restricted when the phone is cooling down

Please re-enter the correct PUK code. SIM will be permanently disabled after multiple unsuccessful attempts.
PUK should include at least 8 digits.

Please Enter the PUK Code for SIM %1$d

PIN must be entered after rebooting the device

PIN must be entered after switching profiles

Unlock pattern must be drawn to further ensure security
PIN must be entered to further ensure security
SIM is disabled. To continue using it, enter the PUK code. For more details, please contact your carrier.

This function will turn off Cellular Data, Wi-Fi, GPS and other communication functions, and reduce screen brightness and automatic lock screen time to extend the phone usage time.
Always keep mobile data active, even when Wi‑Fi is active (for fast network switching).
You are connected to \"%1$s\" (this app can monitor your network activity, including sending and receiving emails, using apps, and visiting websites).
You are connected to %1$s which can monitor your personal network activity including sending and receiving emails, using apps and visiting websites.

"Your work profile is managed by \"%1$s\" and is connected to \"%2$s\" (this app can monitor your work network activity, including sending and receiving emails, using apps, and visiting websites).
In addition, you are connected to \"%3$s\" (this app can monitor your personal network activity)."

"Your work profile is managed by \"%1$s\" and is connected to \"%2$s\" (this app can monitor your work network activity, including sending and receiving emails, using apps, and visiting websites).
For more information, contact your administrator."
Open the list of trusted credentials
A Certificate Authority has been installed on this device. Your secure network traffic may be monitored or modified.
"Your administrator can monitor and manage your device's settings, corporate permissions, apps, data, and location info."
You are connected to %1$s which can monitor your network activity including sending and receiving Emails, using apps, and visiting websites.
%1$s will use %2$s to manage your device.
Your organization has installed a Certificate Authority for your work profile. Your secure network traffic may be monitored or modified.
Your work profile is connected to \"%1$s\" (this app can monitor your network activity, including sending and receiving emails, using apps, and visiting websites).

"Your device is managed by your organization.
Your administrator can monitor and manage your device's settings, corporate permissions, apps, data, and location info.
Contact your administrator for more details."
Your organization has installed a Certificate Authority on this device. Your secure network traffic may be monitored or modified.
Your administrator has turned on the network logging function (this function will monitor the traffic of your device).

"Your device is managed by \"%1$s\".
Your administrator can monitor and manage your device's settings, corporate permissions, apps, data, and location info.
Contact your administrator for more details."
You are connected to \"%1$s\" (this app can monitor your network activity, including sending and receiving emails, using apps, and visiting websites).

"Your administrator has turned on the network logging function, which will monitor the traffic of your device.
For more information, contact your administrator."
Your personal profile is connected to \"%1$s\" (this app can monitor your network activity, including sending and receiving emails, using apps, and visiting websites).
You are connected to \"%1$s\" and \"%2$s\" (These two apps can monitor your network activity, including sending and receiving emails, using apps, and visiting websites).

"You have authorised the app to establish a VPN connection.
This app can monitor your device and network activity including emails sent and received, apps used and websites visited."

"Your work profile is managed by \"%1$s\".
Your administrator can monitor your network activity, including sending and receiving emails, using apps, and visiting websites.
For more information, contact your administrator.
In addition, you are connected to a VPN, which also has the ability to monitor your network activity."
This app may monitor your network activity, such as websites visited, apps used and emails sent and received.
Swipe up from this side to use navigation gestures in landscape mode.
Swipe up from this side to use navigation gestures in landscape mode.
Swipe inward from the left or right edge and hold to switch to the previous app.

Switch the order of virtual keys to: Recent Tasks, Home, Back
Navigation mode is switched from swipe gestures from both sides to virtual navigation buttons.
Navigation by swipe gestures from both sides is not allowed when the Talkback service is on.

Split screen must be turned on before enabling this feature. Turn on now?
Swipe in opposite directions along two opposite edges of the curved screen to enable Split-screen; repeat this again to exit Split-screen.
Swipe Oppositely Along Two Edges to Activate Split-Screen
Swiping down twice along the edge of the curved screen brings you back to the previous app.
Swipe Twice Along the Edge to Switch to Previous App
This app does not officially support Split-screen, and might work abnormally in this mode.
This app does not officially support split-screen, but its main features work normally in split-screen mode.
Split-screen is not supported as the phone is in one-handed mode.
Back on the left, Recent Tasks on the right
Selectable after turning on \"Fingerprint Sensor Palm\"

Auto Hide Virtual Buttons turned on
Select Combo of Virtual Navigation Buttons
Display Mode of Virtual Navigation Buttons
When \"Swipe-up Gesture Navigation\" is selected, \"Virtual Keys\" will always be hidden, leaving the whole screen for content display.

Swipe upward from the bottom of screen and then hold
Add swipe gesture from both sides

Display the Auto Hide button for virtual keys.
Home in the middle, Recent Tasks by holding finger
Swipe up using three fingers in an app to enter Split-screen mode

Three-finger swipe up is only for split-screen app
Back on the right, Recent Tasks on the left
Tap to remove USB device safely
Faulty SD cards may affect system performance. Replacing them is recommended.
SD card error. Cannot be used normally
Download Apps Supporting Split-screen from OPPO App Store
When you use an app with split-screen support in full screen landscape mode and receive a notification from an instant messaging app, tap \"Split-screen Reply\" to enter split-screen mode.
In an app that supports split screen, simply touch and hold the Recent button to split your screen.
You will exit split-screen mode if you press the Home Button or switch to an app that does not support this function.

Tap the Recent button at the bottom of the screen to enter Multitasking mode, tap the Menu button in the upper right corner of the app, and then tap Split screen to split your screen. Not all apps support this.
Drag an app that supports Split screen out of the Smart Sidebar to open it on a split screen.
Swipe up with 3 fingers to enter the Split screen mode
Swipe up with 3 fingers to enable Split screen
Always Show It on the Right-Hand Side
Pull Down to Enter One-Handed Mode
When the phone is in the portrait orientation, pull down from the bottom of the screen to enter One-Handed Mode.
Mistouch prevention for swipe gestures from both sides
To use gesture navigation when the app is in full-screen landscape mode, swipe up once to bring up the guide bar, then swipe up again.
Swipe twice to navigate when using apps in full screen landscape mode.
Back on both sides, Home in the middle and Recent Tasks by holding finger
This interface does not support split-screen
Cannot split the screen when a floating window exists

About %1$s left based on your usage (%2$s)

"With Advanced Notification Settings, you can set the importance of app notifications from levels 0 to 5.
"Level 5" - Display at the top of the notification list - Allow disturbance in full-screen mode - All notifications will be displayed momentarily
"Level 4" - Prohibit disturbance in full-screen mode - All notifications will be displayed momentarily
"Level 3" - Prohibit disturbance in full-screen mode - All notifications will not be displayed momentarily
"Level 2" - Prohibit disturbance in full-screen mode - All notifications will not be displayed momentarily - No sound or vibration for all notifications
"Level 1" - Prohibit disturbance in full-screen mode - All notifications will not be displayed momentarily - No sound or vibration for all notifications - Do not display on the lock screen or status bar - Display at the bottom of the notification list
"Level 0" - Block all app notifications"
About %1$s left based on your usage
Turn on Power saving mode for the following optimizations:
Turn on Power Saving mode for the following optimisations:
You may turn it off in \"Settings - Battery - Power saving mode\" or in the \"Notification bar\"
For more settings, go to \"Settings - Battery - Power saving mode\".
"Power Saving Mode conserves battery power by: 1. Pausing background auto sync. 2. Reducing screen brightness. 3. Turning off Vibrate on Touch."

"When your system is rooted it may cause the phone to lag or heat up, and your private information such as photos, contacts and accounts to be stolen by third-party apps.
You can fix this by: 1. Updating the system via Wi-Fi; 2. Visiting after-sales service site for assistance."

"Due to severe heating issues, you phone had powered off automatically to cool itself down. Your phone has now returned to normal operation.
The following may cause severe heating issues to your phone: • Using resource intensive apps (such as games, videos, or navigation apps) • Downloading or uploading large files • Using the phone in a high-temperature environment"
Your phone has now returned to normal operation
The phone had powered off automatically due to severe heating issues
Because an app is obscuring a permission request, Settings can’t verify your response.

You will not hear the next alarm on %1$s
You will not hear the next alarm on %1$s unless you disable this mode before then
You will not be disturbed by sound or vibration (except for the alarm sound).You can still hear the sound effect of anything (including music, videos, and games) you choose to play.

You will not be disturbed by sound or vibration (except for sound relating to alarms, reminders, events, and specified callers).You can still hear the sound effect of anything (including music, videos, and games) you choose to play.
This blocks ALL sounds and vibrations including those from alarms, music, videos and games.
This blocks ALL sounds and vibrations including those from alarms, music, videos and games. You can still make phone calls.
